title: League of Legends Will not open
body: I have a problem the pvp.net launcher patcher kernel will continuously stop working I tried to uninstall and then I tried to reinstall and it is still happening I just want to play some league and it is just not working for me today. Please Help I don't know what is causing this.

replies.body:
This can be a common error when your PC is blocking the patcher from launching.  Reinstalling won't necessarily fix this, but re-configuring your operating system to allow league to open properly may.  Your best bet would be to go through the steps of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!

-- Keep in mind that running as admin may only be a temporary workaround, and you should go over those steps to prevent errors occurring elsewhere.
So I found out that running it as administer after uninstalling and reinstalling running as administer fix's it weird
